topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume X, Eastern Europe
topic.body: This volume documents the foreign policy decision-making of the administration of President Ronald Reagan. It highlights U.S. policy toward each of the countries in Eastern Europe, with the exception of Poland.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume X, Eastern Europe
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
